data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Sargodha, Punjab, Pakistan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sargodha, Punjab, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,840 believers in Sargodha to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sargodha, Punjab, Pakistan. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Sargodha who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

Father, I pray that the Jat Chhaddar (Muslim traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jat Chhaddar (Muslim traditions) people know you.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Sargodha, Punjab, Pakistan that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Sargodha, Punjab, Pakistan, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, move the 1,840 believers in the county of Sargodha to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

location.name: Sargodha
location.people_groups_list: Jat Lak, Yadav Ghosi, Mussali, Santia (Muslim traditions), Yadav (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Lak (33,000), Yadav Ghosi (900), Mussali (2,427,000), Santia (Muslim traditions) (1,400), Yadav (Muslim traditions) (21,000)
